Whether you're illegally smol or a heckin' chonker, you'll feel welcome at the Fat Cat Café

No microchip feeders here!

All dishes served on a flat plate to avoid whisker fatigue

Unlimited access to water fountain with purchase of any entrée

We know you love your hoomans, but we here at Fat Cat Café understand your mealtime needs. No deep dishes that irritate your whiskers, no microchip feeders, and no water anywhere near your food.
